---
pagetitle: "Sampling Means Left Tail Area Question"
params:
  mu: 190 
  sigma: 50 
  xbar: 180 
  n: 35 
---

```{r}
mu<-params$mu
sigma<-params$sigma
n<-params$n 
xbar<-params$xbar
```

Suppose that a normal distribution has a mean of $`r mu`$ and a standard deviation of $`r sigma`$. If we take samples of size $`r n`$ from this distribution what is the chance that $\bar x$ will be $`r xbar`$ or less?
